content: --ग्रामः, --पुरं the ancient capital of Laṅkā or Ceylon; also called अनुरोधपुर, described by Rājaśekhara as full of curiosities. It is a large town in the north of Ceylon “with 1600 square granite pillars which supported the floor of an enormous monastery called ‘The Great Brazen Palace’ said to have been built in 161 <ab>B. C.</ab>”
